course_description: An introduction to the overall field of global health, its history, methods, and key principles, with case studies illustrating the burden of disease in nations with strikingly different political-economic context.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4273, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: MW 4-5:15p, Instructor: J. Ham, Status: Closed
